instruction_content_1: 1. Knowledge base can be associated with chatbots for use. Please create a knowledge base first before creating a bot, then link it in the bot settings.
instruction_content_2: 2. Knowledge base supports regular knowledge base and Q&A knowledge base. Regular knowledge base is suitable for unstructured data, supports file formats like text/doc/pdf/md/html, and the system will automatically segment the content after upload, also supports custom segmentation. Q&A knowledge base is suitable for structured Q&A format data, supports batch upload via Excel/Word or custom adding of questions and answers.
confirm_delete_content: Are you sure you want to delete this knowledge base?
no_permission_delete: You don't have permission to delete this knowledge base
